Good sandwich but slightly over hyped.I tried the chicken sandwich, and asked them to put whatever on it that they thought would be good.  It had avocado, beans, cabbage, tomato, cilantro, and some other things.  Tasty, and affordable.The service was quick and friendly.  I would recommend getting your sandwich as take out, because there was a line every time we walked by (no matter what time of day).  It was absolutely a good sandwich, and easily transported to the local beach.  I do think that I referred the shawarma wrap that I got a couple of doors down, and there was no line.
